about.me: Mexican stake pool operator with a degree in Electronics Engineering and MSc. in Computer Science. Previously, the SPO developed consensus-based artificial intelligence for visual perception and localization of autonomous robots. Long-time Bitcoin advocate with a deep passion for Cardano and its Proof-of-Stake (PoS) protocol.
about.server: The block producer and relay nodes were deployed in Google Cloud regions with the lowest CO2 (Finland and the United States), which are carbon neutral. Impact metrics: https://cloud.google.com/sustainability/region-carbon
